articles.author: Devesh Kumar
articles.title: India among the 'unhappiest' countries in the world, reveals World Happiness report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India's rank on the World Happiness Report has improved but still remains lower than small Asian neighbors
articles.content: On 20th March every year, the world celebrates World Happiness Day and the UN Sustainable Development Solutions Network releases an annual report named World Happiness Report. The reports measure glo… [+3042 chars]

articles.author: Nidhi Gupta
articles.title: Before Michelle Yeoh, there was Vivien Leigh: A brief history of Asian actresses at the Oscars - Moneycontrol
articles.description: For decades, Asian-origin actresses in Hollywood have contended with their ancestry even as they outperformed their peers, and in remarkably different ways.
articles.content: Last week, Michelle Yeoh made history by becoming the first Asian woman to win the best actress trophy at the Oscars. This is for all the little girls and boys, who look like me, watching tonight, th… [+8566 chars]
